meta.title: Sinan Yurttadur | Innovation & Transformation Expert
meta.description: Speaker, Entrepreneur and Advisor for Innovation, Digitalization & AI. I guide companies through digital transformation.

hero.subheadline: Speaker, Entrepreneur and Advisor. I help companies leverage innovation and AI strategically to master their transformation journey.

speaking.title: Speaking
speaking.subtitle: Provocative insights for teams ready to think differently

mindset.title: The Innovation Mindset
mindset.description: Why 90% of corporate innovation fails—and how to be part of the 10%. About the psychological barriers that prevent us from creating something truly new.
mindset.takeaway: "Innovation isn't a method. It's a decision."

aiworkshop.title: AI Without the Bullshit
aiworkshop.description: Hands-on workshop: What AI can really do today, where it fails, and how to apply it practically. Together we develop use cases for your company.
aiworkshop.takeaway: "The question isn't whether AI, but which problem you're solving with it."

transformation.title: Transformation is Culture Work
transformation.description: Tools change nothing. People change everything. Why most transformation projects fail due to culture—and how to overcome the invisible resistance.
transformation.takeaway: "Digitalization starts in the mind, not in the tool."

aifinale.title: AI: The Finale
aifinale.description: How AI, Robotics and Quantum Computing will change the future—faster than we think. A look at the convergence of technologies and what it means for all of us.
aifinale.takeaway: "The next 10 years will change everything we know about work."

ventures.title: The Ecosystem
ventures.subtitle: Two companies, one vision: Making innovation tangible.

theneed.description: We help companies develop and successfully implement their innovation strategy.

uxcircle.description: We build digital products that people love and that drive businesses forward.

youtube.title: Insights in
youtube.subtitle: Keynotes, interviews and thoughts on Innovation & Transformation

footer.ctaSubtitle: Whether keynote, workshop or consulting - I look forward to connecting.

booking.title: Stage &
booking.subtitle: For conferences, events, podcasts and interviews – I look forward to your inquiry.

speaker.title: Keynote & Speaker
speaker.description: Inspiring talks for conferences, corporate events and industry gatherings. Provocative insights that spark thinking and drive real change.

podcast.title: Podcast & Interview
podcast.description: As a guest on your podcast or for interviews, panels and discussions. Deep conversations about innovation, AI and the future of work.

about.title: Hey, I'm
about.name: Sinan
about.description1: From idea to execution, from concept to exit. Over the past years, I've built companies, developed digital products, and guided teams through transformations.
about.description2: My drive? Making complex problems simple and empowering people to live innovation instead of just talking about it.
